scripts.openapi:generate:dev: rm -rf openapi && openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:3000/api-json -g typescript-axios -o ./openapi --skip-validate-spec --global-property='modelTests=false,modelDocs=false,apiTests=false,apiDocs=false,openAPIGeneratorIgnoreFile=false,ignoreFileOverride=openapi/.openapi-generator-ignore'
scripts.openapi:generate:production: rm -rf openapi && openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://api.hoster.ai/api-json -g typescript-axios -o ./openapi --skip-validate-spec --global-property='modelTests=false,modelDocs=false,apiTests=false,apiDocs=false,openAPIGeneratorIgnoreFile=false,ignoreFileOverride=openapi/.openapi-generator-ignore'
